title: Cheeky Sword God - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Shounen   Xuanhuan
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manhua   Cultivation   Fast Cultivation   Friendship   Godly Powers   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Imperial Harem   Inheritance   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Murders   Nobles   Politics   Polygamy   Prophecies   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   Souls   Spirits   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Transplanted Memories   Transported to Another World   Tsundere   Weak to Strong
author: Piao Ling Huan
description:
An ordinary youth who just wants to eat and drink.

An Archaic Divine sword.

An impressive and sacrificial love.

Wu Chi had never known what the way of the sword was, but his whole life revolved around the legend of the sword. 

He had never been graceful, but was destined to be the most unusual and unique! 
He was called a shameless swordsman, but his strength proved otherwise!
He lives for the sword, dies for the sword, and goes crazy for the sword!>
